story.title: One Night with the Marine - Episode 2
story.storyDescription: Corporal Nick O’Brien is known for his one-night stands. That’s why he should stay away from his best friend’s sister…
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Kait Ballenger is the author of the Seven Range Shifters and Execution Underground paranormal romance series.

story.prePaywallNotification: Will Nick be able to resist his best friend’s sister? Keep reading ONE NIGHT WITH THE MARINE.
story.postPaywallNotification: Will Nick enter Steph’s bedroom?! Find out in ONE NIGHT WITH THE MARINE.

messages.text: Taking pictures?
Steph proceeds to send Nick a picture of her cleavage inside her low-cut camisole.
Her glasses are near her breasts, sexy nerd style.
Oh my god.
What do you think?
Don’t do this to me, Steph.
We’ve been through this.
As tempting as that photo is, it can’t happen.
You have to sleep with me, Nick.
I’ve been crushing on you since I was a teenager.
Steph, I’m flattered by the offer and you know this is driving me wild, but…
And so I saved myself.
For you.
I’m not asking for commitment. Just one night.
Please say something!
I know it’s weird, but it’s the truth.
I’m twenty-six years old and still a virgin.
I had this whole romantic notion about my first time being with you.
But by the time I realized that wasn’t going to happen, it was too late.
And then, well…med school destroys sex lives.
And nobody wants a twenty-six-year-old virgin.
I think you’re wrong about that.
Think of it as your duty or whatever. I don’t care, as long as you fall on this sword.
Or more accurately, I fall on your sword, but that’s beside the point…
Did you just ask me to deflower you?
Did you just use the word deflower???
You are making this so difficult…
Deflower, really?
Have they been sending you guys romance novels in your care packages again?
And to think everyone always thought you were the quiet, bookish type.
I AM the quiet bookish type…
HENCE WHY I’M STILL A VIRGIN!
And why I’m well versed in romance novels.
A girl’s gotta get her fantasies from somewhere.
Oh sweetheart, this is so much more real than fantasy.
Does that mean what I think it means?
The lock between our two doors is on my side.
And I’m unlocking it right now.
From his door, Nick hears the click of the lock unlocking.
Steph, I need you to listen to me very carefully.
Relock your bedroom door. And no matter what you do, don’t unlock it.
Why!?!
Just do as I say.
Okay, sir.
I think the Corps is getting to your head.
There. I did it.
Nick hears the click of the lock.
Good.
I needed you to do that because two seconds longer and I wasn’t going to be able to hold back anymore.
I would have gone through that door.
Pulled you into my arms
Kissed you hard and deep.
And then…
I would have taken you.
But I don’t think I have it in me to be gentle right now.
And I need to be gentle with you.
At least the first time…
Do you understand?
She sends him a pic.
She’s biting her lower lip in anticipation).
Yes, sir.
I love it when you call me sir.
Four hours later, Nick is tossing and turning.
He can’t stop thinking about Steph’s offer.
He can hear Steph tossing in her bed too.
Suddenly his hormones get the better of him.
He’s about to text her and tell her to unlock the door.
But then a text comes in from Mike.
Hey, man. I know it’s the middle of the night, but Piccirilli just called.
Shit.
What the hell does he want?
He needs one of us to drive over to the base at Beaufort in the morning.
It’s me or you. You up for it?
Sure. What for?
Wants us to pick up a package or something. Didn’t specify.
Did you remind him we’re on leave?
You know how that goes. Duty calls and all.
Yeah, 24/7.
Nick stares at the door between his and Stephanie’s room.
I’m headed out now…
